column5: Centrally located, 18 minutes to the airport, 8 minutes to downtown, and 25 minutes to Palo Duro Canyon! This condo includes 1-King and 1-Queen bed, granite counter-tops and stainless steel appliances, nice living room furniture, cable & wifi, kitchen cookware,utensils,linens,towels and small washer/dryer. Saltwater pool during summer months!
